title: Sri Lanka-India Finance Ministers To Meet; Talks On $1 Billion Loan - NDTV
content: Sri Lanka-India Finance Ministers To Meet; Talks On $1 Billion Loan  NDTV
description: Sri Lanka's Finance Minister Basil Rajapaksha is expected to meet his Indian counterpart Nirmala Sitharaman this week to discuss USD 1 billion loan that the Indian government agreed to provide and will also share the road map on the funds.
